titles.title: Thy Way Not Mine O Lord (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy way not mine O Lord However dark it be Lead me by Thine own hand Choose out the path for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Smooth let it be or rough It will be still the best Winding or straight it leads Right onward to Thy rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I dare not choose my lot I would not if I might Choose Thou for me my God So shall I walk aright{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take Thou my cup and it With joy or sorrow fill As best to Thee may seem Choose Thou my good and ill{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Choose Thou for me my friend My sickness or my health Choose thou my cares for me My poverty or wealth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not mine not mine the choice In things both great and small Be Thou my guide my strength My wisdom and my all{/lang-eng}
